titles.title: I just came to praise the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I just came to praise the Lord
I just came to praise the Lord
I just came to praise His Holy Name
I just came to praise the Lord

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
He came into my life
One very special day
He came into my heart
To show me a better way
He said He would never depart
And this is why I sing:
I just came to praise the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I just came to thank the Lord
I just came to thank the Lord
I just came to praise His Holy Name
I just came to thank the Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I just came to love the Lord
I just came to love the Lord
I just came to praise His Holy ame
I just came to love the Lord
